message.body: Come to maxs
No
Are you coming?
When is report time tonight?
Anyone? Bueller? Bueller?
First off, WHAT THE SHIT, MOTHER.
Nah brah, since were not married, if we had a son, HE would be a bastard
Dont worry about it, people wont be able to see your dress behind your blooming cactus
I am sorry that you have to take such an ugly date to prom and that I am not thin and pretty like Laura I am very very sorry I feel horrible
And I'm also sorry that I am insecure and making you uncomfortable I just feel very bad

Soraya. I dont have much to say to that, because i know anything that i say will not be what you want to hear, because ill bet theres nothing you want to hear right now. But youre lying to yourself. In the mind of everyone else, youre next to perfect, even if you dont feel like it at the moment.
Like absolutely perfect.
Also, lets get froyo. Right now.
I have to finish my English essay :/
Come onnnn
Please?
Maybe after I finish. Who are you with?
Welcome, Kit. Welcome.
Me myself and i. But it closes in 10 minutes!
Uuuuhghhhhhhhh now it closes in 7! Not enough time!!!!
Haha alright, maybe not tonight. But even without froyo, i hope you feel better! And if you need an open ear, im always here :)

I would've liked to get froyo with you and I'm sad that I cannot. But see you being nice just makes me feel worse about making you go to prom with me because I look like a fat, Indian platypus wearing a dirty Brillo pad on its head and I speak like an un-funny, depressed Kathy griffin. And really all of Kathy griffins appeal is her red hair

You know that's all a bunch of bullpuckey. Sure, I asked Laura before I asked you, but as things played out the last few weeks, I honestly and truly can think of no one that I would want to be going with on Friday more than you, bar none. For fear of sounding creepy AF, i wont comment on your stunning body, but I can safely say that your hair is probably in my top 5 best in the school. That list aint easy to get on.
But truly, you are being too hard on yourself. Youre awesome, and dont forget that. As Dory sorta said, "just keep" smilin' bud
Thanks. I just really want you to have a good time
I don't know what to say it just makes me very nervous
You dont need to worry. Im gonna have a blast. And you cant so anything to stop me, purposeful or not.
Is anyone up for doing something tonight?
Kit what would you know about awkward movie experiences?
Come hang out with gabe and i
Sounds good
Are we/are you going to gabbys?
Maybe? Still doing stuff?
Nah, people had essays and stuff to write.
Oh boo nobody's fun
Agreed.
Should we just meet at Casey's at 5?
Sure that works
I'm going to be a little late
No surprise there
Fine by me
Here
Lies
What are you doing/ is gabbys still going/ where is it?
At gabby's it's very chill and nice 407 Madison court
Well be there soon
We'll be there eventually, but we gotta build a tramp first
You alright?
Why wouldn't I be
You seemed upset over something and I worry
Don't, I guess?
Okay so no hanging out?
Yeah, sorry, we both fell asleep
